
### exercise: what will run?  {.smaller}

![](texfig/makeWhatRun.figure.svg)
 exercise: ‘‘make W’’ will run what commands? 
  <table>
<tr><td>A. none</td><td>B. <code>buildY</code> only</td><td>C. <code>buildW</code> then <code>buildY</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>D. <code>buildY</code> then <code>buildW</code></td><td>\multicolumn{2lE. <code>buildX</code> then <code>buildY</code> then <code>buildW</code>}</td></tr>
<tr><td>F. <code>buildX</code> then <code>buildW</code></td><td>G. something else</td></tr>
</table>


### explanation  {.smaller}


::: {.r-stack}
![](texfig/makeWhatRunExplain.figure-1.svg){.fragment .fade-in-then-out fragment-index=1}

![](texfig/makeWhatRunExplain.figure-2.svg){.fragment .fade-in-then-out fragment-index=2}

![](texfig/makeWhatRunExplain.figure-3.svg){.fragment .fade-in-then-out fragment-index=3}

![](texfig/makeWhatRunExplain.figure-4.svg){.fragment .fade-in-then-out fragment-index=4}

![](texfig/makeWhatRunExplain.figure-5.svg){.fragment .fade-in-then-out fragment-index=5}

:::
 

* first: to make W, [need X, Y up to date]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only} 

   * to make X up to date: <br> need Q up to date $\checkmark{}$ <br> [then build X if less recent than Q (yes)]{.fragment fragment-index=3 .custom .myem-only} $\checkmark{}$ <hr />

   * to make Y up to date: need X up to date $\checkmark{}$ <br> need Z up to date $\checkmark{}$ <br> [then build Y if less recent than X (yes) or Z (yes)]{.fragment fragment-index=4 .custom .myem-only} $\checkmark{}$

* [then build W if less recent than X (yes, now) or Y (yes)]{.fragment fragment-index=5 .custom .myem-only} $\checkmark{}$
